select
from contact_time_dict where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and is_del=0
mapper.update: update contact_time_dict set is_del=1 where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and is_del=0
upper contact_time_dict set is_del=1 where is_del=0
mapper.insert: insert into contact_time_dict (`name`, start_time, end_time, creator) values (#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startTime,jdbcType=TIME}, #{endTime,jdbcType=TIME},#{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

`name`,

end_time,
creator,
